Name: Stephen Marshall
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Negroni with hazelnut liqueur. Some will ask: why? Negroni-loving drinkers of hazelnut liqueur might ask: why not?
History: Created in 2012 and named for its inventor, the flamboyant, music-loving whisky ambassador - a man who likes a Negroni, and, it would appear, hazelnut liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Stephen Marshall contains 249 calories
